FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 513 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 Catlanta 2011 f **Catstar**, by Storm Cat. Winner at 2, 20,584 Pounds, in England, 2nd Queen Mary S. **[G3]**; winner in 1 start at 3, 596,987 Dirhams, in United Arab Emirates. Sent from United States to United Arab Emirates in 2002. Returned to United States from Great Britain in 2004. (Total: $197,105). Dam of 8 foals, 6 to race, 5 winners-- update on line 61: + Catlanta (2011 f. by Medaglia d'Oro). Unraced.
